summary: An email from Marc A. Weinstein, a partner at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP, to Andrew Tomback and others, regarding Epstein estate subpoenas. The email indicates Weinstein is preparing to send documents and wants to give a heads-up about something first.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein
persons.role: Partner, Co-Chair of White Collar Defense at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP
persons.context: Sender of the email, preparing to send documents related to Epstein estate subpoenas and wanting to give a heads-up to the recipients.

persons.name: Andrew Tomback
persons.context: Primary recipient of the email from Marc Weinstein regarding Epstein estate subpoenas.

connections.description: Weinstein is communicating with Tomback regarding legal matters (Epstein estate subpoenas), suggesting a professional legal or advisory relationship.

events.title: Email regarding Epstein estate subpoenas
events.description: Marc Weinstein emails Andrew Tomback and others to give a heads-up and indicate he is preparing to send documents related to Epstein estate subpoenas.

keyFacts: The email is dated November 1, 2019, after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
The subject matter involves 'Epstein estate subpoenas', indicating ongoing legal or investigative proceedings related to Epstein's estate.
Marc Weinstein, a white-collar defense partner at a major law firm, is involved in preparing and communicating about these documents.
